name: VR health care (aerobic exercise): VR sport and cycling in Maya gardens
description: VR health care (aerobic exercise): VR sport and cycling in Maya gardens. Enjoy the VR scenery while exercising and forget the fatigue of exercising. Get fun and keep fit. Rule: Simply hold your controller, and run, to get a VR ride in Maya Gardens.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Conexant 20585 SmartAudio HD
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070Ti or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Conexant 20585 SmartAudio HD
